text: http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/config/cluster-manager.html#Common_Attributes talks about notifyListenersOnReplication, it must be notifySessionListenersOnReplication.
creator: mikhailov.dmitry@gmail.com
markt@apache.org
text:
Both of those attributes are valid but they have different purposes (at least in 7.0.x).

I have fixed the docs for 7.0.x and the update will be included in 7.0.17 onwards.

I'll look at 6.0.x next.

Yep, same for 6.0.x.

Docs updated and will be included in 6.0.33 onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org
